content.rendered:
Directed by Amal Neerad

Written by R.J. Murugan. Amal Neerad. Ravishankar P.T.. Devadath Shaji

Star Mammootty (Michael). Soubin Shahir (Ajas). Sreenath Bhasi (Ami). Nadia Moidu (Fathima). Farhaan Faasil (Paul). Shine Tom Chacko (Peter). Dileesh Pothan (James). Jinu Joseph (Simon). Nedumudi Venu (Iravippilla). K.P.A.C. Lalitha (Karthyayaniyamma). Anagha L.K. (Rachel). Manohari Joy . Lena (Susan). Srindaa (Rasiya). Veena Nandhakumar (Jessy). Anasuya Bharadwaj (Alice). Abu Salim (Shivankutty). Sudev Nair (Rajan). Harish Uthaman (Martin). Shebin Benson (Able). Nisthar Sait (Mathai). Maala Parvathi (Molly). Kottayam Ramesh (Mani). Pauly Valsan (Paulythathi). Dhanya Ananya (Elsa).Sankar Induchoodan . Ramzan Muhammed (Star).Amala Rose .Geethi Sangeetha . P.J. Anthony ((archive footage)). Padmaraj Ratheesh (Abda). Hareesh Peradi (Kareem Rowther)

Language Malayalam

Producers Abin Thomas Biju. Amal Neerad. Anwar Rasheed. Arun Unnikrishnan

Production Amal Neerad Productions
